name: Minimal Firefox
description: Check out the next evolution of this userstyle: Ultra Minimal Firefox -------------------------------------- Tried to make it as minimal and pretty yet functional as possible. The URLbar will increase its width when it is focused (clicking on it) and will go back to its min-width when it is no longer being focused. This automatically applies when opening a New Tab. Made a youtube video explaining how to make it look like in the reference pictures: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=42vDNTD2fUQ For further information, please read Notes.
